metadata.title: CVE-2017-7783 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
If a long user name is used in a username/password combination in a siteURL (such as " http://UserName:Password@example.com"), the resulting modalprompt will hang in a non-responsive state or crash, causing a denial ofservice. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 55.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
